home.name: Geeki
home.title: Frontend Developer
home.description:
Welcome to my blog! I'm Geeki, passionate about exploring new technologies and things, always keeping a learning mindset.

I can speak Mandarin, Cantonese, and basic English.

Beyond programming, I'm also passionate about traveling. I've road-tripped across Xinjiang, Yunnan, and Guangxi in China - quite the experienced driver! Internationally, I've traveled with family or solo to Japan, South Korea, Thailand, Malaysia, and other countries.
I enjoy street dancing (popping), love music (a piano beginner...), and watching movies.
Recommended films: Interstellar, Good Will Hunting, The Truman Show.
Currently diving into reading. Recommended books: Conversations with God, The Power of Now, How to Read a Book.
home.experienceDes: 3+ years in web and app development, passionate about creating elegant user interfaces
home.ctaDes: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities.
